channel.title: Comments on: MCTS Podcast 20: Dr. Waldron’s International Ministry Opportunities

item.title: By: Chris Cullnane II
item.dc:creator: Chris Cullnane II
item.description: Dr. Waldron, Will you be dealing with divine simplicty in your course on the doctrine of God? A Ph.D. thesis at Westminster has just been written on that topic.
item.content:encoded:
Dr. Waldron,
Will you be dealing with divine simplicty in your course on the doctrine of God? A Ph.D. thesis at Westminster has just been written on that topic.
